paragraphs.0: AHKStrategies was founded by Ashraf Kahoush to help organizations harness the power of artificial intelligence and strategic partnerships.
paragraphs.1: With decades of experience in technology and business development, Ashraf leads a team committed to delivering measurable results.
paragraphs.2: We are headquartered in Cairo and collaborate globally to build products and alliances that unlock growth.
